```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(shufflecards)
library(shiny)
```

<i class="fab fa-github" aria-hidden="true"></i> GitHub repo : https://github.com/dreamRs/shufflecards

<!-- data -->
```{r}
deck <- expand.grid(
  suits = c("hearts", "spades", "diamonds", "clubs"),
  values = c("a", 2:10, "j", "q", "k")
)
deck$order <- as.numeric(deck$values)
```


<!-- sorting buttons -->
```{r}
rmd_group_buttons(
  shuffleId = "grid", label = "Click to sort cards !",
  sort_button("Sort by value", "cardVal", numeric = TRUE, icon = icon("sort-numeric-asc")),
  sort_button("Sort by value (decreasing)", "cardVal", numeric = TRUE, desc = TRUE, icon = icon("sort-numeric-desc")),
  sort_button("Sort by suits", "cardSuits", icon = icon("sort-alpha-asc")),
  sort_button("Random!", "random", icon = icon("random"))
)
```


<!-- shuffle grid layout -->
```{r}
shuffle_container(
  shuffleId = "grid",
  no_card = "No card to display!",
  card_list = lapply(
    X = seq_len(nrow(deck)),
    FUN = function(i) {
      shuffle_card(
        groups = deck[i, "suits"], # for filtering
        cardVal = deck[i, "order"], # for sorting
        cardSuits = deck[i, "suits"], # for sorting
        playing_card(deck[i, "suits"], deck[i, "values"])
      )
    }
  )
)
```
